snippet.title: RIN: The Last Child - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Metroidvania with magic coming Q3 2022! Wishlist on Steam:
[]+[]https://store.steampowered.com/app/1960070/RIN_The_Last_Child/ []+[]

A dark fairytale Metroidvania with a unique spellcrafting system. 

Immerse yourself in the story about Rin - a demigoddess - burdened with the task of restoring balance to the decaying World. 
Explore it to discover the hidden truth behind her mission and help her obtain the power of Aspects to craft unique spells and defeat the monsters. This dark fairy tale lets you make decisions using Rin's free will - but beware. Your choices impact the state of the World.

The fate of the World is in your hands. Choose your path wisely.

Join us on:
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/RINmetroidvania
Twitter https://twitter.com/SpaceFoxGames
Discord https://discord.gg/GUaQB77Gqr

Wishlist Rin: The Last Child on Steam:
[]+[] https://store.steampowered.com/app/1960070/RIN_The_Last_Child/ []+[]
